Chapters.name: Introduction
Chapters.description: Hello, this is a manuel to leard how to play Rockfall.

Chapters.name: How to win
Chapters.description:
To win a game, you must win a few parties (depending on game settings).
            And to win a party, you have to align 4 rocks (of yours) horizontally, vertically or in diagonal.
            During a party, each player makes a move by placing a rock on the board or by using a Power Up.

Chapters.name: Power Ups
Chapters.description:
During a party you can win points that allow to use Power Ups. These are very useful and usually affect the party.
            You can only use a Power Up by turn, and if you have the amount of points required.

Chapters.name: Game modes
Chapters.description:
There are three game mode :
                -Solo : you play against the CPU.
                -2 players : You and your oppenent play on the same computer.
                -Online : You play against the world in online epic battles.

Chapters.name: Connection/Signup
Chapters.description:
When you have an account, you are able to save your personal settings and compete in online battles.
             You can test the game without singup, but we recommend that you create an account if you plan to play a lot at this game.
